Description: Fragment of round handle of an Apulian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Damas. From same die as P. Palazzo, Le anfore di Apani (Brindisi), Rome 2013, 102, type B1, 29.4.b.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (336)
